headline.print_headline: Boy, 16, Dies After Falling Down an Elevator Shaft on Staten Island
headline.main: Boy, 16, Dies After Fall Down Elevator Shaft on Staten Island

snippet: The boy sustained trauma to the head after falling several stories down an elevator shaft in an abandoned hospital on Staten Island.
abstract: Sixteen-year-old Marcos Castillo dies after falling down elevator shaft in abandoned building in Tompkinsville, Staten Island.
lead_paragraph: The boy sustained trauma to the head after falling several stories down an elevator shaft in an abandoned hospital on Staten Island.
